sentences.sentence: International aid efforts are slowly gathering pace. A team of French rescuers has set up a field hospital in Derna, but the risk is high for aid workers. On Sunday, four Greek and three Libyan emergency workers were killed in a road accident in the city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17

Police were present, but said they hadn't anticipated the scale of the protest.

sentences.sentence: Austria's government wants to convince more of its citizens to adopt public transport as vehicle emissions remain persistently high. So the Alpine Republic is pushing its new KlimaTicket or Climate Ticket, an annual pass for all public transport from city buses to high speed trains.

sentences.sentence: The emails are from individuals in Russia's trans community, grappling with uncertainty and fear as the parliament implements a controversial bill outlawing gender-affirming care.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: Center T, one of Russia's leading organizations supporting the transgender community, helps people get medical assistance, hormone access and even safe routes out of the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_17
sentences.sentence: In July, Moscow passed a law that bans gender-affirming care, и даже безопасные пути из страны. В июле Москва прошла закон, который отбирает обращение к обращению к гендеру, не обладает рождеством, что связано с гендерными индивидуалами, и не обладает рождеством, что связано с гендерными людьми, которые не могут обращаться к гендеру или обращать детей.
